```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
```


Read a clean version of data:

```{r}
lit_tbl <- read_csv("lit_review_table.csv") |>
  select(Title, Authors = Author, Year, Findings = `Main Findings`)
```

Create spatial plot:

Here is a test plot

```{r}
#| label: tbl-lit-summary
#| tbl-cap: "Summary of the Literature"
#| tbl-alt: "A table listing and describing the literature used in this review"

kable(lit_tbl)

```
